subject: Soccer
Deaths (Obituaries)
World War II (1939-45)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trautmann, who once played with a broken neck, said that his training as a paratrooper had made it easy to perform acrobatic dives as a goalkeeper.
snippet: Mr. Trautmann, who once played with a broken neck, said that his training as a paratrooper had made it easy to perform acrobatic dives as a goalkeeper.
